name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Snapper: Screenshot & Playback Speed Controller

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture screenshots from YouTube videos and controls playback speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Snapper is your ultimate companion for enhancing your YouTube viewing experience. This powerful Chrome extension allows you to effortlessly capture high-quality screenshots from any YouTube video, making it easy to save and share your favorite moments. Whether you want to keep a memorable scene or highlight important information, YouTube Snapper has you covered.

YouTube Snapper also features intuitive playback speed controls. You can adjust the video speed from 1x to 3x, allowing you to speed up playback for a quicker viewing experience or slow down for detailed analysis. This flexibility ensures you can consume content at your own pace.

With a user-friendly interface, YouTube Snapper makes it easy to use its features without any hassle. Simply click the extension icon while watching a video to capture a screenshot or adjust the playback speed with just a few clicks.

Experience YouTube like never before with YouTube Snapper, your go-to tool for capturing moments and customizing playback!
